name: Huize Holding Limited
short_description: Huize Holding Limited offers insurance brokerage services in the People's Republic of China.
long_description: Huize Holding Limited offers insurance brokerage services in the People's Republic of China. It provides critical illness, and illness and disease insurance products; term life, whole life, and annuity insurance products; and property and casualty insurance products, including travel, individual casualty, and corporate liability insurance products. The company also offers technology development and Internet information consulting services; and management, investment, and financial consulting services. It provides its insurance products through Internet and mobile Internet channels. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.
